titles.title: Special Needs Trust Improvement Act of 2022
Special Needs Trust Improvement Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify rules relating to beneficiaries of charitable remainder trusts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Special Needs Trust Improvement Act of 2022
This bill allows a nonprofit charitable organization to be named as the remainder beneficiary of a Special Needs Trust (i.e., a trust that preserves a beneficiary's eligibility for needs-based government benefits).
